name: Worldforger
description:
i technically took this on in less than 3 days due to me joining late and laying it off for many hours ToT

I tried, maybe there's enough there for potential to be seen

CONTROLS:

WASD = MOVE

LEFT CLICK = GRAB MATERIALS

How to play:

simple as it gets, theres no real game here but rather an idea that would've become a game. There are 'materials' on one shelf and 'elements' on the other, you can pick one of each and then you must click the table in the centre to create your mini-world.

The empty shelves would've housed 'life', meaning you could choose a certain type of life to live on your mini-world and then the final shelf would contain 'doomsday events' meaning you could choose a way of destroying your created mini-world

Basically, it was going to be a god simulator hence why the scenery is basically just above the clouds
